Title: Bosch 06015A4360 GHO 28-82 D Professional Planer 710W 110V BSH6015A4360
Description:
Bosch GHO 28-82 D Professional Planer 110V Version

The Bosch GHO 28-82 D Professional Planer is fitted with a powerful motor for fast stock removal. It has a simple front shoe adjustment that provides accuracy and stability. This also helps to reduce front plate distortion. The cutting depth can be adjusted from 0 to 2.6mm in 0.1mm steps. The cord is fitted with a swivel ball-joint that provides increased flexibility for ease of use and reduces the potential for breakage.

Supplied with: 1 x Allen Key, 1 x Fabric Dust Bag, 1 x Parallel Guide & 1 x Carry Case

Specification:

Input Power: 710W.
No Load Speed: 18,000/min.
Planing Width: 82mm.
Adjustable Rebate Depth: 9mm.
Cutting Depth: 0-2.6mm.
Sound Pressure Level: 84 dB(A).
Weight: 2.8kg.
